page.title: 10FARMHOUSES AND ANIMALS
page.content:
Most people on farms have{dairy cows. Other animals include{sheep, beef {cattle, pigs, hens,dogs, and ponies. The cattle are mainly used for beef. Most people live in old farm houses but only a few live in a listed building (architecturally interesting). Some of the farm houses are very old, some date back to the 16th. Century others are 1702, 1814, 1884 and 1818 so most of them are over 100 years old. All the people who live on farms have lived there for over 12 months, other dates include 2 years, 40 years, 6 years, 11 years, 12 years, and one person has lived there since they were born.
by Anthony Hassall.
